tool_description: this is a simple api to transle any text (from, to) +200 international languages
name: text translation
title: text translation

api_list.name: translate
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://text-translation6.p.rapidapi.com/xenova/translate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-translation6.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://text-translation6.p.rapidapi.com/xenova/translate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-translation6.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
